snippet: SCHULMAN KLOTZ--Brenda Feb. 11, 1938 - Feb. 15, 2007. In memory of my twin sister Bren. My first love, my other half. My sadness never leaves me. Requiescat in pace, Brenda. Evelyn 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHULMAN KLOTZ--Brenda Feb. 11, 1938 - Feb. 15, 2007. In memory of my twin sister Bren. My first love, my other half. My sadness never leaves me. Requiescat in pace, Brenda. Evelyn 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  SCHULMAN KLOTZ, BRENDA FEB
